description: 共同科英文（二）課程為一學期兩學分課程，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 1. 增進學生英語溝通表達能力 2. 透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神 3. 透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野 4. 透過課堂討論培養批判精神 5. 提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**教學目標****Objectives:**

For the second semester, **oral speaking and presentation in English would be the main focus. With different visual aids and class activities, students will be trained to present their ideas/opinions in English; meanwhile, students are required to do the individual English presentation for 3 minutes this semester**.

  Students will engage in different discussion and practice under the instructor’s guide to improve students’ English speaking, listening, writing, and reading abilities. Students are encouraged to speak in English mainly in class with the instructor’s guide this semester. Also, students’ endeavor to participate in all class activities with the proactive learning attitude will also be the core of scoring.

**上課要求與規則****Requirements and Rules:**

1.  **Your learning attitude is essential in this class**. You need to focus both on your attendance and class activities. Without joining any class activities, discussion, or practice, you won’t get a higher score for this class. **(****學習態度及積極參與課堂活動為本評分重點****，****沒有盡力參與課堂活動、討論或練習不會獲得高分****)**
2.  **You’ll be asked to mainly speak in English during the class as much as you can for this semester, but you can ask for help in Chinese sometimes**. (**本學期將以同學的英文表達為主，故會要求同學以英文主要發言**)
3.  **Attendance is required**. **Missing 4 classes, without telling your teacher in advance (at least “a week” before your absence) with a proper reason, you will be failed for this class. If you’re late, it costs you 1 point every time. Please note that if you’re late for more than 15 minutes, you’ll be absent for that class. For 1 absence, it costs you 2 points every time. (****缺席四次，在沒有以****「****正當理由及原因****」****事先告知老師下****，將無法通過此課程。每次遲到扣一分，遲到超過****15****分鐘視同缺席****。缺席一次扣****2****分。有任何狀況請記得事先主動****e-mail****或親自告知老師****，臨時緊急狀況請主動事後告知。請假請以「正當理由及原因」告知老師並補上證明。****)**
4.  **Textbook is a must**. **Violation of this rule will cost you 1 point (out of your final score) each time**. (**You can bring no textbook ONLY when the teacher informs you!**) **(****請依老師的指示帶課本****。****沒帶課本，每次扣總成績一分。****)**
5.  **3-minutes English Presentation****三分鐘英文簡報**: We don’t have midterm exam; instead, you need to give an individual 3-minutes English presentation.
6.  **Final presentation of personal interview****期末個人英文訪談口試****:** **You’ll have an individual interview with your teacher in English for 8 minutes**. Interview questions will be given in advance. While you’re having the interview, **you can’t read or bring any scripts/notes**. Just have a chat with ![](file:///C:/Users/Susan/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image001.png)your teacher.  
7.  You **cannot** use your laptop or smart phone in class **without the teacher’s permission**. Also, **do not do irrelevant activities in class.** Violation of this rule will cost you **2** points each time. **(****只有在老師允許時能用電子產品，上課請勿使用手機或筆電，違者扣兩分；上課做課堂無關活動者，每次扣兩分****)**
8.  **Please check Moodle and e-mail frequently!** It’s your responsibility to make sure you register with the correct e-mail address on Moodle. **Not receiving a notice or forgetting to check is NOT an excuse for any class activities. (****請隨時查看****Moodle****及老師寄的****e-mail!** **各種作業、活動因沒有收到通知、不知道或忘了查看而沒做並不是理由。****)**
9.  **Our syllabus will be adjusted based on the real class schedule. Please make sure you read any notice from teacher’s mail or Moodle. (****實際上課進度將因上課狀況做調整****)**
10.  **P****lease RESPECT your classmates, your teacher, and this class. Any serious violation of this class might cause great outcome on your final score. If you have any problems/questions, you are always welcome to talk to your teacher.**

**A. Extra bonus**: Join 3mins English presentation contest (三分鐘英文簡報比賽).

**B. 補救活動****make up activities:** If you have a bad performance in class, including your learning attitude, attendance, presentation, class participation, **your final exam of personal interview will last for 15 minutes, and you’ll be the last one to get the interview**. **Your makeup interview will be held on 6/18 or 6/25.** **You need to perform and prepare well for your interview with the extra questions**.
